name: WW2 Rebuilder Demo
description:
WW2 Rebuilder - pick up cities from the ashes!

WW2 Rebuilder is a simulator that allows you to pick up destroyed cities from the ashes after Grand Global German Offensive (World War 2). Create a better future for people in Europe after this devastating time by reconstructing the architecture. 

Hero's Journey

Our hero’s journey starts in his home in Bilbury, England. Demo version allows you to travel with him to his first stop - Soham train station, where he not only helps with reconstructing what was lost, but also gets to meet history.  

Throughout the game you will collect resources and craft materials to flip houses, repair industrial buildings, roads and squares so the tenants could live in their homes happily again.

In the full version of the game you will find yourself in different parts of London, Lymphe airforce base and in Belfast. But! Our mission doesn’t end in England. 

There are different countries that could use a hand of a talented rebuilders after WW2. With new heroes, each with their own story, we  will get to renovate places and houses in Germany, France and many more.

Join our community!

For any help regarding our game or to report a bug join our discord: https://discord.com/invite/5NB6wKjQBx

Tune in and follow us on social media for more informations on upcoming updates. 

https://www.facebook.com/MadneticGames

https://twitter.com/madnetic_games

WW2 Rebuilder: Germany Prologue to be relased on 26th of July! Don't miss out on a new quests.
